Text.Page:
Our venators spotted a new type of argon near the Dryuul Cyasma Infuser. They don't appear to be soldiers, but we don't know their true function. Gatherers of some sort, maybe?

Go kill a few and bring me something to study.
What did you learn? Are these gatherers a threat?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Indeed. I found these."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

But these are hearts...and they're not argon at all.

Blast and damnation! The argons augment their forms with our components? They gain strength as we lose it!
I need clues to figure out what these new argons are all about, <PCNAME>. Get moving.
